mapper.select: SELECT * FROM code_rule_config where biz_type = #{bizType} for update limit 1

UPDATE code_rule_config SET version = version + 1, current_value = current_value + #{count} * step_size, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = ( SELECT id FROM code_rule_config WHERE biz_type = #{bizType} ORDER BY id LIMIT 1 ) returning *
